Method Detail

setPreviousPopup

public void setPreviousPopup(Object c)
Tell the module that this was the last pop-up displayed. If the user clicks on 'edit last addition', this pop-up will be displayed again.

Parameters:
c - Object widget that displays pop-up

popupShowing

public boolean popupShowing()
Checks whether any pop-ups are visible. If so, user cannot press any buttons or open menus.

Returns:
true if there is a visible pop-up

getType

public int getType()
Returns the session type

Returns:
int

unsubmittedInfo

public boolean unsubmittedInfo()
Checks whether the user has added any information, that should be submitted before closing the window

Returns:
true if the session contains information not yet in the archive

disableUndo

public void disableUndo()
Sets undo to false, so that next feedbacktext update the undo button will be disabled

getUserName

public String getUserName(String id)
Retrieves the name of the user with the given ID

Parameters:
id - User ID

setMessage

public void setMessage(String user,
                       String resource,
                       String title)
Changes the welcoming message to a more personalised version

Parameters:
user - User name
resource - Resource type
title - Resource title (may be null)

init

public void init(String user,
                 String userID)
Shows a pane that asks the user what resource he/she is depositing.

Parameters:
user - Username
userID - User ID

showRDF

public void showRDF(String rdf)
Deprecated. 

Displays the RDF-representation of the Semantic Graph. Used previously for debugging.

Parameters:
rdf - String RDF

reset

public void reset()
Resets the querying session, displaying the class hierarchy again.

showFolksonomy

public void showFolksonomy(HTMLPanel panel)
Displays the tagcloud in the given panel in the bottom of this module

Parameters:
panel - HTMLPanel with tagcloud

hideFolksonomy

public void hideFolksonomy()
Hides the tagcloud, if one is present. It is saved as a variable so it can be displayed if someone presses 'edit last addition'.

removeFolksonomy

public void removeFolksonomy()
Removes the tagcloud entirely, if one is present.

initPanel

public void initPanel(AnchorInfo[] ai)
Displays the feedback text

Parameters:
ai - Feedback text

getKey

public String getKey()
Get session ID.

Returns:
String.

initPanel

public void initPanel(AnchorInfo[] ai,
                      boolean u)
Displays the feedback text

Parameters:
ai - Feedback text
u - If true, enable undo button next time the text is updated

setActiveLabel

public void setActiveLabel(WysiwymLabel lb)
If the user clicks on an anchor, that label becomes 'active' and displays its pop-up menu. The previously active anchor hides its menu.

Parameters:
lb - WysiwymLabel

isPunctuation

protected boolean isPunctuation(AnchorInfo[] ai,
                                int idx)
Check if the label at the given index ends in a punctuation character.

Parameters:
ai - AnchorInfo[], contains labels and anchors
idx - Index
Returns:
True if the last character of the label is a punctuation symbol.

onClick

public void onClick(Widget sender)
Click listener on buttons. If submit, submit description; if undo, undo last information addition; if redo, re-add last information removal; if reset, reset description; if help, display help diagram; and if previous, display previously show pop-up.

Parameters:
sender - Button Widget

regenerateFeedbackText

public void regenerateFeedbackText(Object o)
Display the new feedback text

Parameters:
o - Object (should be AnchorInfo[]). Null if error occurred during generation.

regenerateFeedbackText

public void regenerateFeedbackText(Object o,
                                   boolean u)
Display the new feedback text

Parameters:
o - Object (should be AnchorInfo[]). Null if error occurred during generation.
u - True if undo button should be enabled next time the text is regenerated.

regenerateFeedbackText

public void regenerateFeedbackText(Object o,
                                   boolean u,
                                   boolean r)
Display the new feedback text

Parameters:
o - Object (should be AnchorInfo[]). Null if error occurred during generation.
u - True if undo button should be enabled next time the text is regenerated.
r - True if redo button should be enabled next time the text is regenerated.
